name: Unveil (itch)
description:
Submission for CGDC Speedgame: Hardmode

Game by Matt Colón

Music and sound by Bobby Vickery
https://bobby-vickery-music.itch.io/unveil-ost

Created in Unity

Note: All music was created during the course of the speedgame.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD or arrow keys
  • Hold "K" and push in a direction to attack or interact (later you can use "J", "I", and "L" for other attacks in the same manner)
  • Push "P" to use a potion from your inventory to restore hearts

Other Info:

Enemy Health: 10 hit points
Enemys deal 2 damage each attack

Normal attacks: 5 damage
Line attack: 2 damage to all enemies in a line
Pushback attack: 2 damage to all enemies above, below, left, and right of the player
Blast attack: 10 damage in a triangle in front of the player

Press Alt+F4 to close the game after a game over or when done.

If any of you are having trouble beating the game, make sure you use distance attacks as much as you can once you get them!  You can also swing your sword in place to take your turn while drawing the enemy toward you.

Also, if it's still too challenging or you don't have time to play, feel free to watch this Let's Play video so you can experience the entire story!
